verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Ye shall be<WH1961> holy:<WH6918> for<WH3588> I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> am holy.<WH6918>
Ye shall fear<WH3372> every man<WH376> his mother,<WH517> and his father,<WH1> and keep<WH8104> my sabbaths:<WH7676> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
Turn <WH6437> ye not<WH408> unto<WH413> idols,<WH457> nor<WH3808> make<WH6213> to yourselves molten<WH4541> gods:<WH430> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
And if<WH3588> ye offer<WH2076> a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002> unto the LORD,<WH3068> ye shall offer<WH2076> it at your own will.<WH7522>

It shall be eaten<WH398> the same day<WH3117> ye offer<WH2077> it, and on the morrow:<WH4480> <WH4283> and if aught remain<WH3498> until<WH5704> the third<WH7992> day,<WH3117> it shall be burnt<WH8313> in the fire.<WH784>
And if<WH518> it be eaten at all<WH398> <WH398> on the third<WH7992> day,<WH3117> it<WH1931> is abominable;<WH6292> it shall not<WH3808> be accepted.<WH7521>

Therefore every one that eateth<WH398> it shall bear<WH5375> his iniquity,<WH5771> because<WH3588> he hath profaned<WH2490> <WH853> the hallowed thing<WH6944> of the LORD:<WH3068> and that<WH1931> soul<WH5315> shall be cut off<WH3772> from among his people.<WH4480> <WH5971>

And when ye reap<WH7114> <WH853> the harvest<WH7105> of your land,<WH776> thou shalt not<WH3808> wholly reap<WH3615> <WH7114> the corners<WH6285> of thy field,<WH7704> neither<WH3808> shalt thou gather<WH3950> the gleanings<WH3951> of thy harvest.<WH7105>

And thou shalt not<WH3808> glean<WH5953> thy vineyard,<WH3754> neither<WH3808> shalt thou gather<WH3950> every grape<WH6528> of thy vineyard;<WH3754> thou shalt leave<WH5800> them for the poor<WH6041> and stranger:<WH1616> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
Ye shall not<WH3808> steal,<WH1589> neither<WH3808> deal falsely,<WH3584> neither<WH3808> lie<WH8266> one<WH376> to another.<WH5997>
And ye shall not<WH3808> swear<WH7650> by my name<WH8034> falsely,<WH8267> neither shalt thou profane<WH2490> <WH853> the name<WH8034> of thy God:<WH430> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Thou shalt not<WH3808> defraud<WH6231> <WH853> thy neighbor,<WH7453> neither<WH3808> rob<WH1497> him: the wages<WH6468> of him that is hired<WH7916> shall not<WH3808> abide with thee all night<WH3885> <WH854> until<WH5704> the morning.<WH1242>

Thou shalt not<WH3808> curse<WH7043> the deaf,<WH2795> nor<WH3808> put<WH5414> a stumblingblock<WH4383> before<WH6440> the blind,<WH5787> but shalt fear thy God:<WH3372> <WH4480> <WH430> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Ye shall do<WH6213> no<WH3808> unrighteousness<WH5766> in judgment:<WH4941> thou shalt not<WH3808> respect<WH5375> the person<WH6440> of the poor,<WH1800> nor<WH3808> honor<WH1921> the person<WH6440> of the mighty:<WH1419> but in righteousness<WH6664> shalt thou judge<WH8199> thy neighbor.<WH5997>

Thou shalt not<WH3808> go up and down<WH1980> as a talebearer<WH7400> among thy people:<WH5971> neither<WH3808> shalt thou stand<WH5975> against<WH5921> the blood<WH1818> of thy neighbor:<WH7453> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Thou shalt not<WH3808> hate<WH8130> <WH853> thy brother<WH251> in thine heart:<WH3824> thou shalt in any wise rebuke<WH3198> <WH3198> <WH853> thy neighbor,<WH5997> and not<WH3808> suffer<WH5375> sin<WH2399> upon<WH5921> him.

Thou shalt not<WH3808> avenge,<WH5358> nor<WH3808> bear any grudge<WH5201> against<WH853> the children<WH1121> of thy people,<WH5971> but thou shalt love<WH157> thy neighbor<WH7453> as thyself:<WH3644> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Ye shall keep<WH8104> <WH853> my statutes.<WH2708> Thou shalt not<WH3808> let thy cattle<WH929> engender<WH7250> with a diverse kind:<WH3610> thou shalt not<WH3808> sow<WH2232> thy field<WH7704> with mingled seed:<WH3610> neither<WH3808> shall a garment<WH899> mingled<WH3610> of linen and woolen<WH8162> come<WH5927> upon<WH5921> thee.

And whosoever<WH376> <WH3588> lieth<WH7901> carnally<WH7902> <WH2233> with<WH854> a woman,<WH802> that<WH1931> is a bondmaid,<WH8198> betrothed<WH2778> to a husband,<WH376> and not<WH3808> at all redeemed,<WH6299> <WH6299> nor<WH176> <WH3808> freedom<WH2668> given<WH5414> her; she shall be<WH1961> scourged;<WH1244> they shall not<WH3808> be put to death,<WH4191> because<WH3588> she was not free.<WH2666> <WH3808>

And he shall bring<WH935> <WH853> his trespass offering<WH817> unto the LORD,<WH3068> unto<WH413> the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> even a ram<WH352> for a trespass offering.<WH817>

And the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> him with the ram<WH352> of the trespass offering<WH817> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> for<WH5921> his sin<WH2403> which<WH834> he hath done:<WH2398> and the sin<WH4480> <WH2403> which<WH834> he hath done<WH2398> shall be forgiven<WH5545> him.

And when<WH3588> ye shall come<WH935> into<WH413> the land,<WH776> and shall have planted<WH5193> all manner<WH3605> of trees<WH6086> for food,<WH3978> then ye shall count<WH6188> <WH853> the fruit<WH6529> thereof as uncircumcised:<WH6189> three<WH7969> years<WH8141> shall it be<WH1961> as uncircumcised<WH6189> unto you: it shall not<WH3808> be eaten<WH398> of.
But in the fourth<WH7243> year<WH8141> all<WH3605> the fruit<WH6529> thereof shall be<WH1961> holy<WH6944> to praise<WH1974> the LORD<WH3068> withal.

And in the fifth<WH2549> year<WH8141> shall ye eat<WH398> <WH853> of the fruit<WH6529> thereof, that it may yield<WH3254> unto you the increase<WH8393> thereof: I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
Ye shall not<WH3808> eat<WH398> any thing with<WH5921> the blood:<WH1818> neither<WH3808> shall ye use enchantment,<WH5172> nor<WH3808> observe times.<WH6049>
Ye shall not<WH3808> round<WH5362> the corners<WH6285> of your heads,<WH7218> neither<WH3808> shalt thou mar<WH7843> <WH853> the corners<WH6285> of thy beard.<WH2206>
Ye shall not<WH3808> make<WH5414> any cuttings<WH8296> in your flesh<WH1320> for the dead,<WH5315> nor<WH3808> print<WH5414> any marks<WH3793> <WH7085> upon you: I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Do not<WH408> prostitute<WH2490> <WH853> thy daughter,<WH1323> to cause her to be a whore;<WH2181> lest<WH3808> the land<WH776> fall to whoredom,<WH2181> and the land<WH776> become full<WH4390> of wickedness.<WH2154>
Ye shall keep<WH8104> <WH853> my sabbaths,<WH7676> and reverence<WH3372> my sanctuary:<WH4720> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Regard <WH6437> not<WH408> them that have familiar spirits,<WH178> neither<WH408> seek<WH1245> after<WH413> wizards,<WH3049> to be defiled<WH2930> by them: I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

Thou shalt rise up<WH6965> before<WH4480> <WH6440> the hoary head,<WH7872> and honor<WH1921> the face<WH6440> of the old man,<WH2205> and fear thy God:<WH3372> <WH4480> <WH430> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
And if<WH3588> a stranger<WH1616> sojourn<WH1481> with<WH854> thee in your land,<WH776> ye shall not<WH3808> vex<WH3238> him.

But the stranger<WH1616> that dwelleth<WH1481> with<WH854> you shall be<WH1961> unto you as one born among<WH249> <WH4480> you, and thou shalt love<WH157> him as thyself;<WH3644> for<WH3588> ye were<WH1961> strangers<WH1616> in the land<WH776> of Egypt:<WH4714> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
Ye shall do<WH6213> no<WH3808> unrighteousness<WH5766> in judgment,<WH4941> in meteyard,<WH4060> in weight,<WH4948> or in measure.<WH4884>

Just <WH6664> balances,<WH3976> just<WH6664> weights,<WH68> a just<WH6664> ephah,<WH374> and a just<WH6664> hin,<WH1969> shall ye have:<WH1961> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> which<WH834> brought you out<WH3318> <WH853> of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
Therefore shall ye observe<WH8104> <WH853> all<WH3605> my statutes,<WH2708> and all<WH3605> my judgments,<WH4941> and do<WH6213> them: I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
